title: Ticket #1960: condor_vm-gahp cd-rom handling and image format handling.
description:
1.) Currently cd-rom text file mundging is completely broken, idea is to move all info into the disk and pass iso's, let the user create however they would like to, but give instructions on easy methods.

2.) Newer libvirt defaults to raw if no img format is specified. resolution is to append :format to the end of the string which is then passed to libvirt.
remarks:
2011-Mar-11 15:59:01 by jfrey:
The patch looks OK to me. A couple minor things:

  • The new condor_create_vm_iso.sh can use some trimming, like removing all mention of xm or virsh.

  • You introduce a misspelling of 'Madison' in cm_type.cpp.

  • In several places, you change whitespace without any code changes, which makes the patch longer and more annoying to read.

2011-Mar-11 16:09:51 by tstclair:
I was debating if I should remove the script entirely as there are a million and 1 instructions on howto create an iso.

Whoops on the random character insert.

I will try to limit my whitespace changes.

2011-Mar-11 16:29:10 by jfrey:
I'd say ditch it. We can add it or a variant later on if we think people will want it.
